Ethics
IT Ethics Code Documentation

Introduction

Ethical codes are put in place for many developers for us. Without them we become hackers and cyber crimnials without these regulations

Basic Guidelines

  • Contribute to society and to human well-being
  • Avoid harm
  • Respect privacy

To learn more in-depth, visit the ACM Code of Ethics.

Best Practices

Stand Against Unethical Coding

Work Together for Accurate Data

To learn more about these tips, visit the Coding Standards.
